text: The Battle of Khalkhin Gol was a battle that was fought between the Soviet Union and Mongolia, against Japan. This battle was fought in Manchuria, located in the northeast of China. The battles happened from 11 May 1939 to 16 September 1939. The Soviets and Mongolians won the battles. The battle was named after a river located on the battlefield called Khalkhin Gol. == References == == Sources == * * * == Notes == Category:1930s in Japan Category:20th century in Mongolia Category:1930s in the Soviet Union Category:1939 in Asia Khalkhin Gol Khalkhin Gol Khalkhin Gol
title: Battles of Khalkhin Gol
